reboot.description: To reboot the Keenetic, click this button.

reset-to-default.description: To return to factory settings, select 'Reset all settings'. Regardless of the current operating mode, your Keenetic will switch back to "Router" mode after returning to the factory default settings.

alert.title: Deleting custom settings
alert.description: Factory settings are being restored. If you are managing this Keenetic device remotely, your connection will be lost.

progress.title: Deleting custom settings
progress.description: Keenetic is being booted with factory settings
